content.raw_text: From: Notion no-reply@notion.so To: neha.sharma@gmail.com Subject: Welcome to Notion Plus, Neha 👋 Hi Neha, Thanks for upgrading! You’ve just subscribed to the Notion Plus Plan. Plan: Plus Workspace: Neha’s Workspace Amount charged: $8.00 Billing cycle: Monthly Next payment date: July 19, 2025 You now have access to unlimited file uploads, 30-day version history, and more. View invoice | Manage billing Cheers, – The Notion Team

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: aarav.kumar@gmail.com Subject: Your payment to Notion was successful Hi Aarav, Here’s a receipt for your recent payment: Plan: Personal Pro Amount: $48.00 Billing period: June 2025 – June 2026 Payment method: **** 4242 Download invoice Thanks for being a part of Notion. – Team Notion

From: Notion no-reply@notion.so To: ananya.singh@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion trial ends in 3 days Hey Ananya, Your 14-day free trial of Notion Plus ends on June 22, 2025. Upgrade now to continue enjoying all the premium features — like unlimited guests, page history, and admin tools. Upgrade Now See you soon, Notion

From: Notion Support support@notion.so To: rohit.verma@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion subscription has been canceled Hi Rohit, Your subscription to the Personal Pro Plan has been canceled. You’ll still have access to premium features until your billing period ends on June 30, 2025. If you change your mind, you can reactivate your subscription anytime. Reactivate Plan Thanks for trying Notion! – The Notion Team

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: meera.jain@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion plan has been renewed Hi Meera, Thanks for staying with us! Your subscription to the Plus Plan has been renewed. Amount charged: $96.00 Billing period: June 19, 2025 – June 19, 2026 Payment method: **** 1092 View receipt Have a great day, The Notion Team

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: kunal.patel@gmail.com Subject: We couldn’t process your payment Hi Kunal, We tried to process your payment for the Notion Plus Plan, but it didn’t go through. Amount: $8.00 Date: June 19, 2025 Please update your billing information to keep your subscription active. Update Payment Let us know if you need help. – Notion Support

From: Notion AI ai@notion.so To: swati.mishra@gmail.com Subject: You’ve started a Notion AI trial Hi Swati, Welcome to your Notion AI trial! For the next 7 days, you can explore all the ways AI can boost your productivity—summarizing notes, generating content, and more. Trial ends on June 26, 2025. See what AI can do Enjoy! – Notion Team

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: raj.singh@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion AI subscription has been renewed Hi Raj, Thanks for continuing with Notion AI. Amount charged: $8.00 Billing period: June 19, 2025 – July 19, 2025 Payment method: **** 2381 Manage AI subscription Have a productive month, Notion

From: Notion no-reply@notion.so To: shruti.designops@gmail.com Subject: Your workspace is now on the Business Plan Hi Shruti, You’ve upgraded to the Business Plan for your workspace: “DesignOps”. Amount charged: $180.00 Seats: 3 Billing cycle: Annual Access new features like advanced security controls, SAML SSO, and workspace analytics. Explore features Thanks for upgrading, Notion

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: arvind.singh@gmail.com Subject: Your refund from Notion is complete Hi Arvind, We’ve processed your refund for the Plus Plan. Amount refunded: $96.00 Date: June 17, 2025 Payment method: **** 7884 It may take 5–10 business days to appear in your bank account. Let us know if you need anything else. – Notion Billing Support

From: Notion no-reply@notion.so To: ishita.patel@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion invoice is ready Hi Ishita, Your invoice for this billing cycle is now available. Invoice #: INV-556432 Amount: $8.00 Date issued: June 19, 2025 Plan: Notion Plus – Monthly Download Invoice – Notion

From: Notion Team team@notion.so To: dev.rajput@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion Team trial has started Hi Dev, Thanks for trying out Notion’s Team Plan! You now have 14 days to explore collaboration tools like private teamspaces, admin roles, and shared permissions. Trial ends on July 3, 2025. Start setting up – Notion Team

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: aisha.khan@gmail.com Subject: Your payment method has been updated Hi Aisha, You’ve successfully updated your payment method on file for your Notion subscription. No further action is needed. Want to double-check? Manage billing Thanks, Notion Billing Team

From: Notion no-reply@notion.so To: parth.joshi@gmail.com Subject: 1 new seat added to your plan Hi Parth, You’ve added a new member to your workspace: Creative Team. Your new monthly bill reflects the additional seat: New charge: $16.00/month (2 seats) Manage seats Thanks for growing with us, – Notion Team

From: Notion Support support@notion.so To: isha.mehra@gmail.com Subject: Your plan has been downgraded Hi Isha, Your workspace has been downgraded to the Free Plan. You’ll still be able to access your content, but some premium features will no longer be available. Upgrade again anytime Thanks for using Notion, The Notion Team

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: rhea.malik@gmail.com Subject: Auto-renewal enabled for your subscription Hi Rhea, Your Skillshare Plus Plan is now set to auto-renew. Your payment method will be charged automatically on your next billing date: August 20, 2025. If you want to disable auto-renewal, visit: Manage billing Thanks for being with Notion! – Notion Billing Team

From: Notion Support support@notion.so To: vivek.rao@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion subscription is paused Hi Vivek, Your Notion subscription has been paused as per your request. You will retain access until July 15, 2025, after which billing will stop. You can resume anytime via your account dashboard. Resume Subscription — The Notion Team

From: Notion Security security@notion.so To: anil.das@gmail.com Subject: Your payment method was updated Hi Anil, We noticed your payment method on file was recently changed. If this wasn’t you, please secure your account immediately: Secure Account If you need help, contact support@notion.so. — Notion Security Team

From: Notion Team team@notion.so To: sangeeta.kumar@gmail.com Subject: You joined the workspace "Marketing" Hi Sangeeta, You have successfully joined the workspace “Marketing”. Start collaborating and exploring all the tools your team uses. Go to Workspace Welcome aboard! – Notion Team

From: Notion Billing billing@notion.so To: david.morris@gmail.com Subject: Your payment method is expiring soon Hi David, The credit card on your account ending in **** 6753 is expiring soon (08/25). Please update your payment information to avoid any interruption in service. Update Payment Info Thanks, Notion Billing Team

From: Notion Offers offers@notion.so To: priya.rao@gmail.com Subject: Upgrade to Business Plan and save 20% Hi Priya, Upgrade your workspace to the Business Plan today and save 20% on your first year. Enjoy advanced security, unlimited seats, and priority support. Upgrade Now Offer valid until July 31, 2025. Let’s grow together! – Notion Team

From: Notion no-reply@notion.so To: harshita.mehta@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion trial has ended Hi Harshita, Your free trial has ended. Convert now to keep access to premium features and avoid disruption. Convert to Paid We’d love to have you stay! – Notion Team

From: Notion Security security@notion.so To: aditya.sharma@gmail.com Subject: Your password was changed Hi Aditya, Your Notion password was successfully changed on June 18, 2025 at 3:45 PM UTC. If this wasn’t you, please reset your password immediately: Reset Password Stay safe, Notion Security Team

From: Notion Support support@notion.so To: monika.gupta@gmail.com Subject: Your workspace has been deleted Hi Monika, As requested, your workspace “Project Alpha” has been permanently deleted. All data is now removed and cannot be recovered. If you need help or want to restore a workspace, contact support. Thanks for using Notion, The Notion Team

From: Notion Updates updates@notion.so To: rishi.kapoor@gmail.com Subject: New! Collaborative whiteboards in Notion Hi Rishi, We’re excited to introduce Collaborative Whiteboards — brainstorm, sketch, and plan in real-time with your team. Try it today and unlock new ways to collaborate! Explore Whiteboards Happy creating, – Notion Team

From: Notion Support support@notion.so To: ananya.malik@gmail.com Subject: Your Notion account has been deactivated Hi Ananya, Your Notion account has been deactivated as requested. You will lose access to all your workspaces and content. If this was a mistake, contact us within 14 days to reactivate. Thanks for being with us, The Notion Team

From: Notion Support support@notion.so To: ananya.malik@gmail.com Subject: Welcome back to Notion! Your account is reactivated Hi Ananya, Welcome back! Your Notion account has been successfully reactivated. All your data and workspaces are restored. Go to Notion Glad to have you with us again, The Notion Team
